case.title: American woman seeking partner in crime - 35 (London)
case.text:
Looking for a partner in crime - but not too much crime, I'm on a visa and would prefer not to get deported.
Must use sarcasm as primary method of communication. Sincerity severely discouraged - except when talking about feeeeelings, then it's mandatory. Best of luck trying to navigate that minefield.
Must be anti-mine. RIP Princess Di.
You don't need to be rich, but being a billionaire is a plus. Would prefer yacht but any boat over 40' will do.
Enough about you - on to me. I am not the female equivalent of the man described above although I once did get a manicure/pedicure. In the genetics department I lucked out with extreme height (177 cm).
Interested? After reading all that? Really? Ok, then. Drop me a line and send a pic.
